meanings.sent1: The spinelessly boy refused to stand up to the bully.
meanings.sent2: She felt spinelessly afraid to speak up in front of the large crowd.
meanings.sent3: The spinelessly puppy hid behind its owner when it heard a loud noise.
meanings.sent4: The spinelessly kitten ran away from a harmless butterfly.
meanings.sent5: His spinelessly behavior made him an easy target for teasing.

meanings.definition: Without a backbone or spinal column.
meanings.sent1: The spinelessly jellyfish floated in the water without any bones.
meanings.sent2: The spinelessly worm wriggled along the ground effortlessly.
meanings.sent3: The spinelessly toy robot was easily crushed underfoot.
meanings.sent4: The spinelessly plant swayed in the breeze without any rigid support.
meanings.sent5: The spinelessly snake slithered through the grass without a backbone.

meanings.definition: In a weak or feeble manner.
meanings.sent1: He spoke spinelessly, barely audible above the noise.
meanings.sent2: She walked spinelessly, her steps hesitant and unsteady.
meanings.sent3: The kitten meowed spinelessly, trying to sound fierce.
meanings.sent4: The wind howled spinelessly through the cracks in the window.
meanings.sent5: The candle flame flickered spinelessly in the gentle breeze.
